title: Gangplank Skin Bundle
body: So one thing i would like to know is will i later be able to purchase the gangplank skin bundle with toy soldier. The reason i ask this is because I've been saving up for it for like a week and in the shop it said it will be available until 8/10/15, yet because gangplank is "dead" i cant purchase it, so what up with that?{{champion:41}}

replies.body: Gangplank is dead! Let there be wailing and gnashing of teeth! Let us all grieve for the fall of our favorite sailor! And let us be patient as we wait to discover the fate of the treasures and skins stashed aboard the Deadpool. Who knows what may be dredged from the burning wreckage?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Mulligan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=UJNhUba0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-30T18:33:00.053+0000)
>
> Gangplank is dead! Let there be wailing and gnashing of teeth! Let us all grieve for the fall of our favorite sailor! And let us be patient as we wait to discover the fate of the treasures and skins stashed aboard the Deadpool. Who knows what may be dredged from the burning wreckage?

All i can think of when i read your name is what i do when i play card games.
He will be back hopefully at some point in time.
As a feller gangplanker, i believe he saved the orange he peeled and brought it too the dock. he ate it then, and was k.
